alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Camden, Brantley, eastern Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hickox, or 8 miles south of Nahunta, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Waynesville, Race Pond, Fort Mudge, Atkinson and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Western Charlton
